verses.verse: אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> I [am] the man רָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> [that] hath seen עֳנִ֔י <S%H6040><s%> affliction בְּשֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> by the rod עֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5678><s%> of his wrath
אוֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> נָהַ֛ג <S%H5090><s%> He hath led וַיֹּלַ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> [me into] darkness וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> but not [into] light

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely בִּ֥י יָשֻׁ֛ב <S%H7725><s%> Surely against me is he turned יַהֲפֹ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> he turneth יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> [against me] all the day ס
בִּלָּ֤ה <S%H1086><s%> hath he made old בְשָׂרִי֙ <S%H1320><s%> My flesh וְעוֹרִ֔י <S%H5785><s%> and my skin שִׁבַּ֖ר <S%H7665><s%> he hath broken עַצְמוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H6106><s%> my bones
בָּנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> He hath builded against עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> and וַיַּקַּ֖ף <S%H5362><s%> me and compassed רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7219><s%> [me] with gall וּתְלָאָֽה׃ <S%H8513><s%> and travail
בְּמַחֲשַׁכִּ֥ים <S%H4285><s%> me in dark places הוֹשִׁיבַ֖נִי <S%H3427><s%> He hath set כְּמֵתֵ֥י <S%H4191><s%> as [they that be] dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of old ס

גָּדַ֧ר <S%H1443><s%> He hath hedged בַּעֲדִ֛י <S%H1157><s%> about וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> me about that I cannot get out הִכְבִּ֥יד <S%H3513><s%> heavy נְחָשְׁתִּֽי׃ <S%H5178><s%> he hath made my chain

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Even כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when אֶזְעַק֙ <S%H2199><s%> Also when I cry וַאֲשַׁוֵּ֔עַ <S%H7768><s%> and shout שָׂתַ֖ם <S%H5640><s%> he shutteth out תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8605><s%> my prayer
גָּדַ֤ר <S%H1443><s%> He hath inclosed דְּרָכַי֙ <S%H1870><s%> my ways בְּגָזִ֔ית <S%H1496><s%> with hewn stone נְתִיבֹתַ֖י <S%H5410><s%> he hath made my paths עִוָּֽה׃ <S%H5753><s%> crooked ס
דֹּ֣ב <S%H1677><s%> He [was] unto me [as] a bear אֹרֵ֥ב <S%H693><s%> lying in wait הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לִ֔י [אַרְיֵה כ] (אֲרִ֖י <S%H738><s%> lion ק) בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <S%H4565><s%> in secret places
דְּרָכַ֥י <S%H1870><s%> my ways סוֹרֵ֛ר <S%H5493><s%> He hath turned aside וַֽיְפַשְּׁחֵ֖נִי <S%H6582><s%> and pulled me in pieces שָׂמַ֥נִי <S%H7760><s%> he hath made שֹׁמֵֽם׃ <S%H8076><s%> desolate
דָּרַ֤ךְ <S%H1869><s%> He hath bent קַשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H7198><s%> his bow וַיַּצִּיבֵ֔נִי <S%H5324><s%> and set כַּמַּטָּרָ֖א <S%H4307><s%> me as a mark לַחֵֽץ׃ <S%H2671><s%> for the arrow ס
הֵבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> to enter בְּכִלְיוֹתָ֔י <S%H3629><s%> into my reins בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> He hath caused the arrows אַשְׁפָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H827><s%> of his quiver

הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become שְּׂחֹק֙ <S%H7814><s%> I was a derision לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> to all my people נְגִינָתָ֖ם <S%H5058><s%> [and] their song כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> all the day
הִשְׂבִּיעַ֥נִי <S%H7646><s%> He hath filled בַמְּרוֹרִ֖ים <S%H4844><s%> me with bitterness הִרְוַ֥נִי <S%H7301><s%> he hath made me drunken לַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H3939><s%> with wormwood ס

וַיַּגְרֵ֤ס <S%H1638><s%> He hath also broken בֶּֽחָצָץ֙ <S%H2687><s%> with gravel stones שִׁנָּ֔י <S%H8127><s%> my teeth הִכְפִּישַׁ֖נִי <S%H3728><s%> he hath covered בָּאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> me with ashes
וַתִּזְנַ֧ח <S%H2186><s%> far off מִשָּׁל֛וֹם <S%H7965><s%> from peace נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my soul נָשִׁ֥יתִי <S%H5382><s%> I forgat טוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> prosperity
וָאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> And I said אָבַ֣ד <S%H6><s%> is perished נִצְחִ֔י <S%H5331><s%> My strength וְתוֹחַלְתִּ֖י <S%H8431><s%> and my hope מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD ס
זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remembering עָנְיִ֥י <S%H6040><s%> mine affliction וּמְרוּדִ֖י <S%H4788><s%> and my misery לַעֲנָ֥ה <S%H3939><s%> the wormwood וָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7219><s%> and the gall
זָכ֣וֹר <S%H2142><s%> hath [them] still תִּזְכּ֔וֹר <S%H2142><s%> in remembrance [וְתָשִׁיחַ כ] (וְתָשֹׁ֥וחַ <S%H7743><s%> bow down ק) עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> My soul

זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> I אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> This I recall אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לִבִּ֖י <S%H3820><s%> to my mind עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אוֹחִֽיל׃ <S%H3176><s%> therefore have I hope ס

חַֽסְדֵ֤י <S%H2617><s%> mercies יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [It is of] the LORD'S כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> indeed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never תָ֔מְנוּ <S%H8552><s%> that we are not consumed כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> indeed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never כָל֖וּ <S%H3615><s%> fail רַחֲמָֽיו׃ <S%H7356><s%> because his compassions
חֲדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2319><s%> [They are] new לַבְּקָרִ֔ים <S%H1242><s%> every morning רַבָּ֖ה <S%H7227><s%> great אֱמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H530><s%> [is] thy faithfulness

חֶלְקִ֤י <S%H2506><s%> [is] my portion יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אָמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> saith נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> my soul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אוֹחִ֥יל <S%H3176><s%> therefore will I hope לֽוֹ׃ ס
ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְקֹוָ֔ו <S%H6960><s%> unto them that wait לְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> for him to the soul תִּדְרְשֶֽׁנּוּ׃ <S%H1875><s%> [that] seeketh
ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] good וְיָחִיל֙ <S%H2342><s%> bear וְדוּמָ֔ם <S%H1748><s%> and quietly wait לִתְשׁוּעַ֖ת <S%H8668><s%> for the salvation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] good לַגֶּ֔בֶר <S%H1397><s%> for a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> should יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> that he bear עֹ֖ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke בִּנְעוּרָֽיו׃ <S%H5271><s%> in his youth ס
יֵשֵׁ֤ב <S%H3427><s%> He sitteth בָּדָד֙ <S%H910><s%> alone וְיִדֹּ֔ם <S%H1826><s%> and keepeth silence כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Since נָטַ֖ל <S%H5190><s%> because he hath borne עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> He putteth בֶּֽעָפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> in the dust פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> his mouth אוּלַ֖י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> if so be there may be תִּקְוָֽה׃ <S%H8615><s%> hope

יִתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> He giveth לְמַכֵּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> to him that smiteth לֶ֖חִי <S%H3895><s%> [his] cheek יִשְׂבַּ֥ע <S%H7646><s%> him he is filled full בְּחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> with reproach ס
כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִזְנַ֛ח <S%H2186><s%> will not cast off לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> For the Lord

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הוֹגָ֔ה <S%H3013><s%> But though he cause grief וְרִחַ֖ם <S%H7355><s%> yet will he have compassion כְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> according to the multitude [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <S%H2617><s%> favour ק)

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> does not עִנָּה֙ <S%H6031><s%> For he doth not afflict מִלִּבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> willingly וַיַּגֶּ֖ה <S%H3013><s%> nor grieve בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> of men ס
לְדַכֵּא֙ <S%H1792><s%> To crush תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> under his feet כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֲסִ֥ירֵי <S%H615><s%> all the prisoners אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

לְהַטּוֹת֙ <S%H5186><s%> To turn aside מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> the right גָּ֔בֶר <S%H1397><s%> of a man נֶ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> In פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before the face עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> of the most High
לְעַוֵּ֤ת <S%H5791><s%> To subvert אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> a man בְּרִיב֔וֹ <S%H7379><s%> in his cause אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> the Lord לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not רָאָֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> approveth ס

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> is there אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Who [is] he [that] saith וַתֶּ֔הִי <S%H1961><s%> comes אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> and it cometh to pass [when] the Lord לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Unless צִוָּֽה׃ <S%H6680><s%> commandeth
מִפִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> Out of the mouth עֶלְיוֹן֙ <S%H5945><s%> of the most High לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> proceedeth הָרָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> not evil וְהַטּֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why יִּתְאוֹנֵן֙ <S%H596><s%> complain אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man חָ֔י <S%H2416><s%> Wherefore doth a living גֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1397><s%> a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> view [חֶטְאֹו כ] (חֲטָאָֽיו׃ <S%H2399><s%> fault ק) ס

נַחְפְּשָׂ֤ה <S%H2664><s%> Let us search דְרָכֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1870><s%> our ways וְֽנַחְקֹ֔רָה <S%H2713><s%> and try וְנָשׁ֖וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> and turn again עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD

נִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> Let us lift up לְבָבֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3824><s%> our heart אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> Toward כַּפָּ֔יִם <S%H3709><s%> with [our] hands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> Toward אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> unto God בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens

נַ֤חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> We פָשַׁ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H6586><s%> have transgressed וּמָרִ֔ינוּ <S%H4784><s%> and have rebelled אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not סָלָֽחְתָּ׃ <S%H5545><s%> thou hast not pardoned ס

סַכֹּ֤תָה <S%H5526><s%> Thou hast covered בָאַף֙ <S%H639><s%> with anger וַֽתִּרְדְּפֵ֔נוּ <S%H7291><s%> and persecuted הָרַ֖גְתָּ <S%H2026><s%> us thou hast slain לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not חָמָֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H2550><s%> thou hast not pitied
סַכּ֤וֹתָה <S%H5526><s%> Thou hast covered בֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> thyself with a cloud לָ֔ךְ מֵעֲב֖וֹר <S%H5674><s%> should not pass through תְּפִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8605><s%> that [our] prayer

סְחִ֧י <S%H5501><s%> us [as] the offscouring וּמָא֛וֹס <S%H3973><s%> and refuse תְּשִׂימֵ֖נוּ <S%H7760><s%> Thou hast made בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people ס
פָּצ֥וּ <S%H6475><s%> have opened עָלֵ֛ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against פִּיהֶ֖ם <S%H6310><s%> their mouths כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H341><s%> All our enemies
פַּ֧חַד <S%H6343><s%> Fear וָפַ֛חַת <S%H6354><s%> and a snare הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> have befallen לָ֖נוּ הַשֵּׁ֥את <S%H7612><s%> is come upon us desolation וְהַשָּֽׁבֶר׃ <S%H7667><s%> and destruction

פַּלְגֵי־ <S%H6388><s%> with rivers מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of water תֵּרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> runneth down עֵינִ֔י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> for the destruction בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people ס

עֵינִ֧י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye נִגְּרָ֛ה <S%H5064><s%> trickleth down וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִדְמֶ֖ה <S%H1820><s%> and ceaseth מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Without הֲפֻגֽוֹת׃ <S%H2014><s%> not without any intermission
עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יַשְׁקִ֣יף <S%H8259><s%> look down וְיֵ֔רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and behold יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Till the LORD מִשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven

עֵינִי֙ <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye עֽוֹלְלָ֣ה <S%H5953><s%> affecteth לְנַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> mine heart מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> because of all the daughters עִירִֽי׃ <S%H5892><s%> of my city ס
צ֥וֹד <S%H6679><s%> chased צָד֛וּנִי <S%H6679><s%> me sore כַּצִּפּ֖וֹר <S%H6833><s%> like a bird אֹיְבַ֥י <S%H341><s%> Mine enemies חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> without cause
צָֽמְת֤וּ <S%H6789><s%> They have cut off בַבּוֹר֙ <S%H953><s%> in the dungeon חַיָּ֔י <S%H2416><s%> my life וַיַּדּוּ־ <S%H3034><s%> and cast אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> a stone בִּֽי׃
